commands: ModCamFOV; 'Main Camera'; 35; interpolation = none; permanent = true

AddTextBox; CharacterSpeechTextBox; (-400, -400); (1100,250); fontSize = 60; font = Drawn-Default; colour = #000000
AddSmoothText; 'Hey there kiddo.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'You can call me Alyx, although everyone else seems to call me the Dreamweaver.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'Now I imagine that you may be wondering where and why you are as of right now, right?'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0.51, 1.309, 2.076); rotateTo = (11.45, 210.78, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alex; colourFromCharacter = Alex
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0, 1.030, 1.855); rotateTo = (0, 180, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alyx; colourFromCharacter = Dreamweaver
AddSmoothText; 'Well for starters, you`re currently in a place called Limbo Lane.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ModShapeKey; OH; Alyx; 60; subObjectName = Alyx; interpolation = none
AddSmoothText; 'And if you`re wondering, Limbo Lane is sort of like a waiting place for those that have died.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'Or more specifically... those with gambling problems which have died.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'And semi-recently, we seem to have had a surge of gambling addicts dying.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'So now Limbo Lane is overcrowded with gamblers, such that we need to clean them up.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ModShapeKey; OH; Alyx; 0; subObjectName = Alyx; interpolation = none
AddSmoothText; 'So, back to my request.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'I would like you to clean up Limbo Lane by `removing` people from this place.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'Don`t worry though, I have a plan.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0.51, 1.309, 2.076); rotateTo = (11.45, 210.78, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alex; colourFromCharacter = Alex
AddSmoothText; 'And what is this plan?'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0, 1.030, 1.855); rotateTo = (0, 180, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alyx; colourFromCharacter = Dreamweaver
AddSmoothText; 'Well the plan is, that since they`re all gambling addicts you should be able to play their favourite card game with them...'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ModShapeKey; ManicStare; Alyx; 100; subObjectName = Alyx; interpolation = none
AddSmoothText; '...and simply have them bet their soul to you if you win.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ModShapeKey; ManicStare; Alyx; 0; subObjectName = Alyx; interpolation = none
AddSmoothText; 'This does mean you`ll have to bet your own soul as well though, so I hope you`re fine with that'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0.51, 1.309, 2.076); rotateTo = (11.45, 210.78, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alex; colourFromCharacter = Alex
AddSmoothText; 'I suppose I just have to be fine with it, seeing as I don`t particularly have any way out of here.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0, 1.030, 1.855); rotateTo = (0, 180, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alyx; colourFromCharacter = Dreamweaver
AddSmoothText; 'Good. Let it be known that if you manage to clean Limbo Lane up enough, I will permit you to leave.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'So, shall I show you how to play phisch and chips now?'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0.51, 1.309, 2.076); rotateTo = (11.45, 210.78, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 0.1; manipulatePermanent = true
ModifyTextBox; CharacterNameTextBox; text = Alex; colourFromCharacter = Alex
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0, 1.44, 1.29); rotateTo = (63.527, 180, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 2; manipulatePermanent = true
ModCamFOV; 'Main Camera'; 60; time = 0.5; clickToSkip = true; permanent = true
AddTextBox; CharacterSpeechTextBox; (0, 470); (1500,100); fontSize = 60; font = Drawn-Default; colourFromCharacter = Dreamweaver; alignment = centre
AddSmoothText; 'This is the `board`.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'While there is no physical board, cards are laid out in a 4x4 grid where each player`s side is 4x2 in size.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'As you can see, there is a pile of cards off to the side.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'This pile is the `Phisch` pile, one card can be taken from this pile each turn.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'The phisch is a special type of card, at the end of every turn it appreciates by one chip.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'I should probably explain how every other card works as well.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'Each card has three main stats: Their health, damage and cost'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'When a card runs out of health, it will be taken off the board.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'Then the player who eliminated the card will gain chips equal to the card`s cost.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'That`s all there really is to Phisch & Chips.'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
AddSmoothText; 'Why don`t we play a round to make sure you understand how it all works?'; CharacterSpeechTextBox; clickToSkip = true
ManipulateObject; 'Main Camera'; moveTo = (0, 1.44, 1.58); rotateTo = (63.527, 180, 0); interpolation = linear; time = 2; manipulatePermanent = true
